  * Grab the latest download of ProntoCMS (or checkout from subversion).
  * Go into "Project Templates" directory
  * Copy the "ProntoCMS Website (VB).zip" into "My Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Templates\ProjectTemplates\"
  * Start Visual Studio 2008
  * File > New > Project
  * Select Visual Basic in the tree then scroll down to "My Templates"
  * Select "ProntoCMS Website (VB)"
  * Enter a name for the project, hit OK and your are done!
